full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSANG SNGAGS THEG PA CHEN PO'I LAS MTHA' THUN RVA BSGRUB TSUL DGRA BO'I SROG GI GSHED MA RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES PA 'DI YANG RANG DANG @004A *, ,SKAL MNYAM 'GA' LA PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM DANG, GZHAN YANG GRONG CHOG PA MGO BSKOR PA RANG GZHAN PHUNG BYED KYI RE 'DRA 'GA' ZHIG ,BAN BON GYI DPE'I HRUL LA BRTEN NAS, GSANG SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI BSTAN PA'I ZHABS 'DREN BYED MKHAN CHOS LUGS YIN ZHES DOM RA DANG RKANG DUNG, THUN RVA SOGS DBYE BA HA MA GO BAR, MGO LA DOM RVA DANG ZHVA DMAR GYON, BYA RKANG LA RVA CO SPRAD NI RKYID DU BCINGS, GDONG LA THAL PA BYUGS CING THUN RVA ZER NI CO GANG RNYED DON MED KYI STONG SGRA SGROGS PHYIR RDE'U SRAN MA BLUGS NAS 'GRO MKHAN 'DRE 'DRA MANG PO MTHON PA'I RKYEN GYIS, ,GZHUNG DANG DAM PA'I MANG NGAG ZHAL SHES LA BRTEN NAS, YI GER BKOD PA'I 'GAL 'KHRUL MCHIS NA MA MKHA' 'GROS BZOD PAR BSOL LO, ,GZUR GNAS MKHAS DBANG TZINTA MA nIS DPYOD PAR MDZOD CIG , BSTAN BSHIGS KYI LAG TU SHOR NA SNGAGS KYI BSRUNG MA AE KA DZA tIS DE'I SNYING KHRAG LA ROL ZHIG KH'A RAm KH'A HI, KHA THAm AiTHI MANGGA LAm, ,)
